actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-98, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2521. Waiving all points of order against consideration of the bill for failure to comply with the provision s of clause 2(l)(6) of rule XI and clause 7 of rule XXI. During consideration of the bill, al l points of order against certain provisions specified in the text of this resolution for failure to comply with clauses 2 and 6 of rule XXI shall be waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 24.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order during consideration of the bill (H.R. 2521) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of H.R. 2521 (armed forces appropriations).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order during consideration of the bill (H.R. 2521) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.
